DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY ; HEALTH_CARE : CASINO EVENT AIDS CANCER RESEARCH
DOC.TEXT: A Casino Night fund-raiser for research into children ' s cancer is scheduled Saturday . The event , beginning at 7:30 p.m. at the Pacific Design Center , 8687 Melrose Ave. , is organized by Concern II , a volunteer group that raises funds for childhood cancer research . Since 1981 , the agency has raised over $ 3 million for cancer research . Organizers are expecting about 2 # 000 guests at the 9th annual event that will include a Treasure Island theme including casino games , treasure_hunts and fortune tellers . Tickets are $ 75 in_advance ; $ 85 at the door . Information : ( 310 ) 724-5335 .
